means: 加利西亚省（西班牙西北部一省）

sentence.Network_en: Book online the cheapest hotels in Galicia - low prices and high discounts.
sentence.Network_cn: 网上预定在加利西亚最便宜的酒店 - 价格优惠折扣多多.

sentence.Network_en: A former property registrar from Galicia, Mr. Rajoy shares Galicians'legendary ability to disguise his intentions.
sentence.Network_cn: 拉霍伊先生原是加利西亚的一名财产登记员, 他发扬了加利西亚人传奇式的掩饰意图的能力.

sentence.Network_en: The 3 - 2 victory in Galicia means Celta have it all to do at Highbury tomorrow night.
sentence.Network_cn: 2的胜利意味着赛尔塔要想翻盘就必须在海布里倾尽全力.

means.word_mean: 1. a region (and former kingdom) in northwestern Spain on the Atlantic and the Bay of Biscay
